title: Redeeming RP Card
body:
I have been trying to Redeem my RP card, and you guys are going to laugh at this but I collect my RP CArds and I was using the wrong one lol.. I have the correct code now. If a Riot Employee could help I could send them the Code and have them confirm the correct one? I really don't want to wait 24 hours.. 

P.S. How come you're not allowed to Gift RP Cards? What if I bought a RP card for a friend and decided to redeem it for them? :P

replies.body: RP Cards can be like gift cards if you'd like to physically gift your friend.  The only other method of gifting RP is through the gifting system; though, I don't have any information on any new methods that might come out for it.  If you need help claiming a card, you can reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) .  Our billing team will be happy to help, and will respond asap!
